body.name: Xgody X60 4G LTE Android Cell Phone Unlocked, 6‘’ QHD Waterdrop Screen, 2GB RAM+16GB ROM, Dual Sim Slots Smartphone, 5MP+5MP Camera, Facial Unlock, 3000mAh Mobile Phones (Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 33 mins
features: 【Stylish Phone with the Best Grip Size】The Xgody X60 upgraded unlocked phone is designed with ergonomics in mind, featuring an 18:9 aspect ratio and a thickness of only 0.33 inches, with a 6-inch screen size that provides a comfortable user experience whether you're watching short videos or reading files. The lighter weight of the phone allows you to hold it for a long time without feeling tired.

【2GB RAM + 16GB ROM】The Xgody X60 android phone features 2GB RAM + 16GB ROM of memory and runs on a stable Android 9 operating system. These upgraded specs ensure that you can enjoy smooth visuals and fast response times when using the phone for movies, video chats, or running multiple apps simultaneously. The unlocked cell phone with a stable Android 9 system, you'll enjoy a more fluently smartphone experience.

【4G LTE + Support 256GB SD Card】The X60 dual sim unlocked cell phone has three independent card slots that can accommodate 1 Nano SIM card, 1 Micro SIM card, and 1 SD card (none of which are included), supporting 4G LTE networks. At the same time, the X60 smartphone unlocked also adopts an upgraded memory compatibility technology, and the SD card can be expanded up to 256GB, allowing you to store pictures, documents, download music, movies, and install application software as you wish.

【3000 mAh Long-Life Removable Battery】The X60 unlocked android phone features a 3000mAh high-capacity battery and ultra-long standby technology. This means that you only need to charge once a day to enjoy a full day of use, with the large battery always keeping you powered up. At the same time, this 6 inch display cheap phone is also a removable phone, so if the battery is damaged, you can easily replace the battery, greatly saving replacement costs.

【5+5MP Camera & Face Unlock】The X60 smart phones unlocked new is a phone with 5+5MP front/rear cameras and a five-hole rear camera design, which is not only practical but also stylish. The Telefono desbloqueado can meet your camera needs in daily life. In addition, the X60 phone also supports face recognition unlock, which can securely protect your privacy. Even if the phone is lost, you don't have to worry about your personal information being leaked. Let the phone be your capable assistant.

【Compatible with AT&T and T-Mobile】The X60 andriod cell phone is a 4G LTE Unlocked phone that works with AT&T and T-Mobile networks and their MVNO networks. Please note that a SIM card is not included. For more information on compatibility with your carrier's program, please check directly with them. (Not compatible with Cricket, Verizon or with CDMA Networks like Sprint and Boost Mobile)

【Professional After-sales Team】 Should you encounter any issues while using our products, please do not hesitate to contact us. Contact entry: Find the corresponding order, then find "Contact Seller", click to enter and select the relevant topic to contact. Our team will promptly review your concerns within 12 hours and respond within 24 hours with a solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features of XGODY X60 Cell Phone Android 9 System: The system is stable and easy to operate.4G LTE high-speed Internet access speed is more than 20 times higher than that of 3G mobile phones.The 6 inch body with waterdrop screen of a screen ratio of 92%, providing a wide field of vision to enjoying video and reading.ROM 16GB & RAM 2GB & MTK6737 Ouad-Core Processor, enough for you to easily switch apps in your daily life.Smart face ID, compared to fingerprint unlocking, free your hands, faster and safer.5MP + 5MP Camera + 256GB memory card expansion (no included), it is convenient for you to record the moments of your life.3000mAH large battery: the video playback time is about 8 hours, the music playback time is about 15 hours, the 4G Internet access is 20 hours, and the standby time is more than 24 hours, no need to worry about power issues throughout the day.
Best Choice Xgody X60 cell phone is the best choice for your first cheap mobile phone or backup phone. Its super cost-effective and simple and stylish appearance make you love it.
Best Gift It can be given to friends, children, parents and employees, etc. It is the best choice for Christmas, Halloween, Valentine's Day and other festivals or birthday gift.

Carrier Compatibility and Channels Q&A: 1、Question: What should I do if the mobile phone cannot receive the network signal? Answer: Excluding the damage of the card slot and the incompatible Sim card, if the network signal cannot be received, you need to insert the Sim card and battery, and then close the battery back cover tightly. There is an antenna for receiving signals in the back cover. 2、Question: Does XGODY X60 work with all carriers? Answer: Sorry, XGODY X60 is only applicable to AT&T and T-Mobile. Please check the frequency range of X60 for compatibility with other carriers. 3、Question: Does it come with a charger? Answer: Sorry, It contains a USB cable, a phone case, a user manual, Tempered film, HD film . But charger, SIM card and TF card are Not Included. 4、Question: Is it a 4G phone? What size sim card does it take? Answer: Yes, but the SIM card is not included. It is 2+1 card slots design. SIM1 is for Nano, SIM2 is for Micro, and the other one is Micro SD Card (Up to 256GB expansion,does not contain). (Dual 4G is not supported, When the dual 4G SIM is in standby, only the 4G network of one of the cards can be used.).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my new cell phone it does everything that the manual says it does. The camera takes awesome pictures. The price is what caught my eye. It came very quick. That was another plus cause my other phone I bought somewhere else was malfunctioning so I needed a phone quick. Thanks Amazon for being a great resource for anything I need. I would recommend Amazon to anyone.
